javax.realtime
Class VTMemory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.realtime.MemoryArea
        |
        +--javax.realtime.ScopedMemory
              |
              +--javax.realtime.VTMemory
public class VTMemory
extends ScopedMemory

VTMemory represents an extensible MemoryArea, shared between one or more real-time threads that exists outside of the Java heap. As such it is not subject to garbage collection, and is safe for use within a non-heap real-time thread. Allocation from this area may take a variable amount of time.

          Create a VTMemory of the given size
